metric.systemDescription: Total number of architecture consistency warnings identified for the system.
metric.name: Number of consistency warnings

metric.systemDescription: Total number of intersections in a projects architecture model.
metric.name: Number of intersections

metric.systemDescription: Total number of layer groups defined in a projects architecture model.
metric.name: Number of layer groups

metric.systemDescription: Total number of layers defined in a projects architecture model.
metric.name: Number of layers

metric.systemDescription: Total number of named interfaces defined in a projects architecture model.

metric.systemDescription: Total number of projects contained in a system.
metric.name: Number of projects

metric.systemDescription: Total number of subsystems defined in a projects architecture model.
metric.name: Number of subsystems

metric.systemDescription: Total number of types that are not assigned to any logical element defined in the architecture model.
metric.name: Number of unassigned types

metric.systemDescription: Total number of vertical slice groups defined in a projects architecture model.
metric.name: Number of vertical slice groups

metric.systemDescription: Total number of vertical slices defined in a projects architecture model.
metric.name: Number of vertical slices

metric.systemDescription: Total number of type references that start from types in the measured element and violate architectural restrictions.
metric.name: Number of violating references

metric.systemDescription: Total number of type dependencies that start from types in the measured element and violate architectural restrictions. Ignored violations are not counted.
metric.name: Number of violating type dependencies

metric.systemDescription: Total number of types with a dependency violation according to the systems architecture model.
metric.name: Number of violating types

metric.systemDescription: Average number of assertions per type in an element. Only such types are considered that define at least one non-abstract and non-native method.
metric.name: Average assertion usage

metric.systemDescription: Total number of assertions of the measured element.
metric.name: Number of assertions

metric.systemDescription: Number of duplicate code blocks detected in source files associated with types that are located in the measured element.
metric.name: Number of duplicate code blocks

metric.systemDescription: Number of types accessible from outside of the measured element, i.e. all public types.
metric.name: Number of public types

metric.systemDescription:
This metric computes a number that should be roughly proportional to the effort needed to clean up structural quality problems in your code. It is computed on build unit level and then aggregated to project and system level. Basically the following major components go into the computation of the metric:
- The number of type dependencies that would need to be cut to break all cyclic package dependencies: 10 metric points per type dependency and 1 additional point per occurrence of the dependency in the code (preferring dependencies that are also architecture violations). - Architecture violations: Again 10 metric points per forbidden type dependency and 1 point per occurrence in the code (already cut cyclic architecture violating dependencies are not counted again). - Refactoring tasks: 1 point for each move, delete and rename refactoring task, 10 points per cut dependency refactoring task. For delete and cut refactoring tasks 1 additional point per occurrence in the code.
Although this metric is certainly not perfect it is a good indicator for the level of structural erosion in a project. The higher the value the more effort will be needed to clean up the project. You will also see that the metric will grow in times of high pressure and that it will shrink when you invest time into improving the structure of the code.
metric.name: Structural debt (index)

metric.systemDescription: Number of code references that must be removed in order to remove all package cycles in a project (this is not always the exact minimum number, but a heuristic-based guess).
metric.name: Structural erosion (reference level)

metric.systemDescription: Number of type dependencies that must be cut in order to remove all package cycles in a project (this is not always the exact minimum number, but a heuristic-based guess).
metric.name: Structural erosion (type level)

metric.systemDescription: Total number of internal type relations divided by the total number of types within the measured element.
metric.name: Relational cohesion (RC)

metric.systemDescription: Total number of cyclically coupled build units contained within a project.
metric.name: Number of cyclic build units

metric.systemDescription: Total number of cyclically coupled directories contained within path container boundaries in a project.
metric.name: Number of cyclic directories

metric.systemDescription: Total number of cyclic coupled elements of any kind contained in a system.
metric.name: Number of cyclic elements

metric.systemDescription: Total number of cyclically coupled layer groups contained in a project.
metric.name: Number of cyclic layer groups

metric.systemDescription: Total number of cyclically coupled layers contained within the direct architectural parent in a project.
metric.name: Number of cyclic layers

metric.systemDescription: Total number of cyclically coupled packages contained in a project.
metric.name: Number of cyclic packages

metric.systemDescription: Total number of cyclically coupled projects contained in a system.
metric.name: Number of cyclic projects

metric.systemDescription: Total number of cyclically coupled source files contained within package boundaries of a project.
metric.name: Number of cyclic source files

metric.systemDescription: Total number of cyclically coupled subsystems contained within the direct architectural parent in a project.
metric.name: Number of cyclic subsystems

metric.systemDescription: Total number of cyclically coupled vertical slice groups contained in a project.
metric.name: Number of cyclic vertical slice groups

metric.systemDescription: Total number of cyclically coupled vertical slices contained within the direct architectural parent in a project.
metric.name: Number of cyclic vertical slices

metric.systemDescription: Total number of all type dependencies (in and out) of types contained in the measured element; including dependencies to external types.
metric.name: Number of type dependencies (all)

metric.systemDescription: Total number of type dependencies (in and out) between all types which are contained in the measured element.
metric.name: Number of type dependencies (local)

metric.systemDescription: Total number of type dependencies (in and out) between the set of types contained in the measured element and the set of types not contained in the measured element; including dependencies to external types.
metric.name: Number of type dependencies (remote)

metric.systemDescription: Total number of elements of the same type which are used by the measured element (files using files, packages using packages, ...).
metric.name: Number of used elements

metric.systemDescription: Total number of elements of the same type which are using the measured element (files using files, packages using packages, ...).
metric.name: Number of using elements

metric.systemDescription: Timestamp of a file.
metric.name: Timestamp

metric.systemDescription: Average number of components (source files) a component (source file) depends on directly and indirectly. This metric can be used to characterize the overall average coupling of project internal components (source files).
metric.name: Average component dependency (ACD)

metric.systemDescription: Average number of types a type depends on directly and indirectly. This metric can be used to characterize the overall average coupling of project internal types.
metric.name: Average type dependency

metric.systemDescription: Total number of project internal elements that the measured element directly and indirectly depends upon.
metric.name: Depends upon

metric.systemDescription: Level of the measured element in the projects dependency hierarchy. See the User Manual for the definition of level.
metric.name: Level

metric.systemDescription: The ratio between the cumulative component dependency of a project and the cumulative component dependency of a balanced binary tree of the same size. A value greater than 1 indicates a more vertical design. A value less than 1 indicates a more horizontal design.
metric.name: Normalized cumulative component dependency (NCCD)

metric.systemDescription: The ratio between the cumulative type dependency of a project and the cumulative type dependency of a balanced binary tree of the same size. A value greater than 1 indicates a more vertical design. A value less than 1 indicates a more horizontal design.
metric.name: Normalized cumulative type dependency

metric.systemDescription: Average component dependency divided by the number of project internal source files multiplied by 100 (in percent).
metric.name: Relative average component dependency

metric.systemDescription: Average type dependency divided by the number of project internal types multiplied by 100 (in percent).
metric.name: Relative average type dependency

metric.systemDescription: Total number of abstract types divided by the total number of concrete types in the measured element - The metric has a range of [0,1]. 0 means that the container contains no abstract types. 1 means that the container contains nothing but abstract types.
metric.name: A (Abstractness)

metric.systemDescription: Total number of types outside of the measured element that depend upon types inside the measured element via incoming dependencies.
metric.name: Ca (Afferent coupling)

metric.systemDescription: Total number of types inside of the measured element that depend upon types outside the measured element via outgoing dependencies.
metric.name: Ce (Efferent coupling)

metric.systemDescription: D = A + I - 1 - The metric has a range of [-1,1]. A good value should be around 0.
metric.name: D (Distance)

metric.systemDescription: I = Ce/(Ca+Ce) - The metric has a range of [0,1]. If there are no outgoing dependencies, then I will be 0 and the measured element is stable. If there are no incoming dependencies, then I will be 1 and the measured element is instable. Stable means that the element is not so easy to be changed. Instable means that it is easier to be changed.
metric.name: I (Instability)

metric.systemDescription: Total number of lines of code in the measured element. Counts every line that is not a blank or comment line, regardless of the number of statements.
metric.name: Lines of code

metric.systemDescription: Total number of Java source files contained in the measured element.
metric.name: Number of Java source files

metric.systemDescription: Total number of Java class files contained in the measured element.
metric.name: Number of Java target files

metric.systemDescription: Total number of build units aggregated for the measured element.
metric.name: Number of build units

metric.systemDescription: Total number of excluded Java source files contained in the measured element; all files are counted which contain at least one excluded type.
metric.name: Number of excluded Java source files

metric.systemDescription: Total number of excluded Java class files contained in the measured element; all files are counted which contain at least one excluded type.
metric.name: Number of excluded Java target files

metric.systemDescription: Total number of excluded (external) types contained in the measured element.
metric.name: Number of excluded external types

metric.systemDescription: Total number of excluded (internal) types contained in the measured element.
metric.name: Number of excluded internal types

metric.systemDescription: Total number of external packages contained in the system. External packages are only referenced, and there is no corresponding code available in the workspace.
metric.name: Number of external packages

metric.systemDescription: Total number of external types contained in the measured element. External types are only referenced, and there is no corresponding code available in the workspace.
metric.name: Number of external types

metric.systemDescription: Total number of byte code instructions of a class file aggregated for the measured element.
metric.name: Number of instructions

metric.systemDescription: Total number of internal packages contained in the measured element.
metric.name: Number of internal packages

metric.systemDescription: Total number of internal types contained in the measured element that are abstract or interface types.
metric.name: Number of internal types (abstract)

metric.systemDescription: Total number of internal types contained in the measured element.
metric.name: Number of internal types (all)

metric.systemDescription: Total number of internal types contained in the measured element that contain at least one implemented method.
metric.name: Number of internal types (w/ implementation)

metric.systemDescription: Total number of abstract methods contained in the measured element.
metric.name: Number of methods (abstract)

metric.systemDescription: Total number of all methods contained in the measured element.
metric.name: Number of methods (all)

metric.systemDescription: Total number of methods with implementation contained in the measured element.
metric.name: Number of methods (w/ implementation)

metric.systemDescription: Total number of statements contained in the measured element.
metric.name: Number of statements

metric.systemDescription: Total number of warnings which are related to the measured element and have been converted to fix warning tasks.
metric.name: Number of fix warning tasks

metric.systemDescription: Total number of violations which are related to the measured element and filtered out by a violation filter.
metric.name: Number of ignored violations

metric.systemDescription: Total number of warnings which are related to the measured element and filtered out by an ignore warning filter.
metric.name: Number of ignored warnings

metric.systemDescription: Total number of refactoring tasks defined in the measured element.
metric.name: Number of refactoring tasks

metric.systemDescription: Total number of tasks defined in the measured element.
metric.name: Number of tasks

metric.systemDescription: Total number of warnings which are related to the measured element. All kinds of warnings are counted.
metric.name: Number of warnings (all)

metric.systemDescription: Total number of cycle group warnings which are related to the measured element.
metric.name: Number of warnings (cyclic)

metric.systemDescription: Total number of duplicate code block warnings which are related to the measured element.
metric.name: Number of warnings (duplicate code blocks)

metric.systemDescription: Total number of threshold warnings which are related to the measured element.
metric.name: Number of warnings (thresholds)

metric.systemDescription: Total number of workspace warnings which are related to the measured element.
metric.name: Number of warnings (workspace)

metric.systemDescription: cyclomatic complexity - accumulated for all methods in the measured element.
metric.name: Cyclomatic complexity (accumulated)

metric.systemDescription: Average accumulated cyclomatic complexity per type - calculated for all types in the measured element.
metric.name: Cyclomatic complexity (average accumulated per type)

metric.systemDescription: Average cyclomatic complexity per method - calculated for all methods in the measured element.
metric.name: Cyclomatic complexity (average per method)

metric.systemDescription: Maximal accumulated cyclomatic complexity per type in the measured element.
metric.name: Cyclomatic complexity (max accumulated per type)

metric.systemDescription: Maximal cyclomatic complexity per method in the measured element.
metric.name: Cyclomatic complexity (max per method)

metric.systemDescription: Extended cyclomatic complexity - accumulated for all methods in the measured element.
metric.name: Extended cyclomatic complexity (accumulated)

metric.systemDescription: Average accumulated extended cyclomatic complexity per type - calculated for all types in the measured element.
metric.name: Extended cyclomatic complexity (average accumulated per type)

metric.systemDescription: Average extended cyclomatic complexity per method - calculated for all methods in the measured element.
metric.name: Extended cyclomatic complexity (average per method)

metric.systemDescription: Maximal accumulated extended cyclomatic complexity per type in the measured element.
metric.name: Extended cyclomatic complexity (max accumulated per type)

metric.systemDescription: Maximal extended cyclomatic complexity per method in the measured element.
metric.name: Extended cyclomatic complexity (max per method)

metric.systemDescription: Modified cyclomatic complexity - accumulated for all methods in the measured element.
metric.name: Modified cyclomatic complexity (accumulated)

metric.systemDescription: Average accumulated modified cyclomatic complexity per type - calculated for all types in the measured element.
metric.name: Modified cyclomatic complexity (average accumulated per type)

metric.systemDescription: Average modified cyclomatic complexity per method - calculated for all methods in the measured element.
metric.name: Modified cyclomatic complexity (average per method)

metric.systemDescription: Maximal accumulated modified cyclomatic complexity per type in the measured element.
metric.name: Modified cyclomatic complexity (max accumulated per type)

metric.systemDescription: Maximal modified cyclomatic complexity per method in the measured element.
metric.name: Modified cyclomatic complexity (max per method)
